channel.title: Css basics
channel.description:
[center] [size=5]CSS STYLES[/size]
[url=http://programming.fusion-fx.info/forums][img]http://programming.fusion-fx.info/images/css_s.png[/img][/url] [/center]
[size=4][b]Embeding Css Style:[/b][/size]
Add this inside the <head> tag inside an html file. Also change style.css to your style sheet name. [code] <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" /> [/code]
[size=3][b]Width, Height.[/b][/size]
To add Width to any css property you need to add: [code] width:80px; [/code] Change 80px to how many pixels wide.
[b]-Height[/b] [code] height:80px; [/code] Same as above, change to how many pixels wide.
[size=3][b]Font Properties[/b][/size]
[b]Font Size:[/b] Change the percent as you see changes. [code] font-size: 100%; [/code]
[b]Font Type:[/b] Change courier to whatever font. [b]Remember: Not everyone has the font you do.[/b] [code] font-family: courier [/code]
[b]Font Color:[/b] Change the color code (#CC9999) to whatever color you want it to be. [code] color:#CC9999; [/code]
[size=3][b]Background Properties[/b][/size]
[b]Background Color:[/b] Change the color code (#3366FF) to the color you want. Remember, always use [b]#[/b] if your using a color code! [code] background-color:#3366FF; [/code]
[b]Background Image:[/b] Change "bg.gif" to your background image file. [code] background-image:url(bg.gif); [/code]
[size=3][b]Borders[/b][/size]
[b]Border Type:[/b] Several Diffrent border types: [code] border:thin; border:thick; border:dashed; border:dotted; border:double; border:groove; border:hidden; border:inset; [/code]
[b]Border Colors:[/b] Add this property. Change the color code, of course. [code] border:#0066FF; [/code]
[size=4][b]List Types:[/b][/size]
[b]Dymond/Disk Symbols:[/b] [code] list-style-type: disc; [/code]
[b]Circle List Symbols:[/b] [code] list-style-type: circle; [/code]
[b]Square List Types:[/b] [code] list-style-type: square; [/code]
To Preview these list types click [url=http://programming.fusion-fx.info/html/previews/list_types.html]Here[/url]
[size=4][b]Margins:[/b][/size]
margin: 2cm 4cm 3cm 4cm
[b]To be continued...........[/b]
http://programming.fusion-fx.info/forums/index.php?topic=15.msg29#msg29

item.title: Css basics
item.dc:creator: @iwasinmoparseas101cl iwasinmoparseas101class
item.description:
@iwasinmoparseas101cl wrote:

you should also include classes as well such as p.odd{ } and all that stuff. I would consider that basic, and much more usable to modify certain aspects of the page as opposed to changing it on a universal level

Read full topic

item.title: Css basics
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[center]
[size=5]CSS STYLES[/size]


[/center]

[size=4]Embeding Css Style:[/size]

Add this inside the tag inside an html file. Also change style.css to your style sheet name.

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="style.css" />

[size=3]Width, Height.[/size]

To add Width to any css property you need to add:

width:80px;

Change 80px to how many pixels wide.

-Height

height:80px;

Same as above, change to how many pixels wide.

[size=3]Font Properties[/size]

Font Size:
Change the percent as you see changes.

font-size: 100%;

Font Type:
Change courier to whatever font. Remember: Not everyone has the font you do.

font-family: courier

Font Color:
Change the color code (#CC9999) to whatever color you want it to be.

color:#CC9999;

[size=3]Background Properties[/size]

Background Color:
Change the color code (#3366FF) to the color you want. Remember, always use # if your using a color code!

background-color:#3366FF;

Background Image:
Change “bg.gif” to your background image file.

background-image:url(bg.gif);

[size=3]Borders[/size]

Border Type:
Several Diffrent border types:

border:thin;
border:thick;
border:dashed;
border:dotted;
border:double;
border:groove;
border:hidden;
border:inset;

Border Colors:
Add this property. Change the color code, of course.

border:#0066FF;

[size=4]List Types:[/size]

Dymond/Disk Symbols:

list-style-type: disc;

Circle List Symbols:

list-style-type: circle;

Square List Types:

list-style-type: square;

To Preview these list types click Here

[size=4]Margins:[/size]

margin: 2cm 4cm 3cm 4cm

To be continued…

http://programming.fusion-fx.info/forums/index.php?topic=15.msg29#msg29

Read full topic
